sentences.en: An inquest recorded a verdict of suicide.
sentences.cn: 验尸记录的结论为自杀.

sentences.en: An open verdict was the only appropriate one , given the very unclear evidence at the inquest.
sentences.cn: 调查发现的证据十分不清楚,只有作出存疑判决才恰当.

sentences.en: But , as for me, I come to the inquest with other senses than they possess.
sentences.cn: 至于我呢, 我要用他们所不具备的其它感觉来寻求答案.

sentences.en: For example, as China sold sought food security it's policy inquest, its policies increased fertilizer use.
sentences.cn: 比如郭, 中国味了寻求事物的安全, 它的政治就会增加肥料的使用.

sentences.en: Inquisition means the document recording the result of an inquiry, or coroner's inquest.
sentences.cn: 调查报告指记录审讯结果或验尸结果的文件.

sentences.en: That is, that the inquest fine grains of printing inks and dispersion conditions.
sentences.cn: 即油墨其颗粒研细程度及分散状况.

sentences.en: The inquest has been largely farcical anyway.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说,这次审讯基本上是场闹剧.

sentences.en: The inquest heard that she died from multiple injuries.
sentences.cn: 死因调查表明她死于多处受伤。

sentences.en: The inquest on his death will is hold next thursday.
sentences.cn: 下星期四审讯他命案的死因.

sentences.en: The inquest will bring in a verdict of suicide.
sentences.cn: 这次审讯将得出自杀的结论。

sentences.en: The judge awaits the coroner's inquest before giving a verdict.
sentences.cn: 法官在作裁决前等待验尸官的调查.

sentences.en: The person in charge an inquest is called a coroner.
sentences.cn: 负责审查的人是验尸官.

sentences.en: The three - year inquest into the case has proved nothing.
sentences.cn: 对该案历时三年的调查毫无结果.

trans.tran_cn: [法]（有陪审员列席的）审讯，验尸，查询，调查，公审庭，陪审团
trans.tran_en: a legal process to find out the cause of someone’s death
